title: Can't Launch League
body: Whenever I go to launch the client to log in, it just crashes. I go into my task manager and see that it is not open. I have tried running it as administrator and uninstalling it and reinstalling it but nothing seems to be working. Please help.

replies.body:
If your patcher is closing before it even gives you a chance to log in, it could be that your pc doesn't have the correct permissions set up. Without those permissions in place, your OS might be blocking the client (silly OS thinks the client is bad sometimes). 

Follow the steps in our [Permission Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) so we can be sure that your OS allows the patcher to launch.
